editorialSummary.text: NYC bureau for the Cable News Network, with behind-the-scenes tours available by reservation.

originalText.text: Can you change the name from CNN to CON? Since it’s not reporting actual fact checked “News” the second letter should stand for “Opinion” right? I don’t want to be negative or critical here, just accurate.

text.text: Can you change the name from CNN to CON? Since it’s not reporting actual fact checked “News” the second letter should stand for “Opinion” right? I don’t want to be negative or critical here, just accurate.

originalText.text:
What the hell are you doing!!! You just released a report about a Palestinian woman being held in the Israeli prison without highlighting the fact that she was held there because she stabbed an Israeli police officer!!! The last I checked in the USA this type of an offense is considered a felony punishable by two years to life imprisonment! Why are you using vastly different parameters for USA and Israel?!
This is irresponsible at best and covertly antisemitic at worst!!! Hamas is undeniably enjoying your bias reporting and unfair portrayals of this war.
Start reporting more fairly! Start talking about the fact that if Israel didn’t have Iron Shield it would’ve been decimated by Hamas!!! Start talking about the fact that premier goal of Hamas is to eradicate Jewish people in Israel and all over the world! Start talking about the fact that Hamas is building influence around the world and you are helping them!

Wow! It's a very big building.
It looks like the 30,000 poor immigrants you promoted will be able to live here.
Why don't you take responsibility?

originalText.text: CNN is wondering why Joe Biden is not getting the recognition he deservse, It is because every time people go to CNN there is a commercial on, that is a big turnoff. We counted 12 commercials in one setting and changed the channel. Feel free to respond !

originalText.text:
They only have two shows that are worth a damn. Fareed Zakaria GPS & Smerconish.  The rest will rot your brain with a bunch of provocateurs. Very little real news mostly nonstop political gossip.

They also love to play the race card. when two people get into an altercation and both parties are of a different race, CNN, will try to provoke strife. Mainly against the the white person.

We just had a few shootings of innocent people, but they covered the black kid in KCMO as “ white man shoot black kid”. But a few days later when a white kid snd her father in Gastonia  were shot by a black man, not a peep.

Its like they’re trying to start a race war.
